00034 #ifndef HARPS_CLOCK
00035 #define HARPS_CLOCK
00036 
00037 #include <harps/utils.hpp>
00038 #include <harps/config.hpp>
00039 
00040 #include <utility>
00041 
00042 namespace harps {
00048   inline float noteToFrequency( float _note ) {
00049     return 13.75f * exp2f( ( _note - 9.0f ) / 12.0f );
00050   }
00051 
00052   typedef double Time;
00053   typedef std::pair< Time, Time > TimeMatrix;
00054 
00055   enum {
00056     GLOBAL = -1,
00057     LOCAL = 0,
00058     KEY = 1,
00059     TONE = 2
00060   };
00061 
00065   template< unsigned int _which > class ClockMatrixCalc {
00066   };
00067 
00071   template<> class ClockMatrixCalc< LOCAL > {
00072     public:
00073       inline static void updateCache( TimeMatrix *_cache, TimeMatrix *_coef ) {
00074         _cache[ LOCAL ] = _coef[ LOCAL ];
00075         _cache[ KEY ].first = _coef[ LOCAL ].first * _coef[ KEY ].first;
00076         _cache[ KEY ].second =
00077           _coef[ LOCAL ].second * _coef[ KEY ].first + _coef[ KEY ].second;
00078         _cache[ TONE ].first = _coef[ LOCAL ].first * _coef[ TONE ].first;
00079         _cache[ TONE ].second =
00080           _coef[ LOCAL ].second * _coef[ TONE ].first + _coef[ TONE ].second;
00081     }
00082   };
00086   template<> class ClockMatrixCalc< KEY > {
00087     public:
00088       inline static void updateCache( TimeMatrix *_cache, TimeMatrix *_coef ) {
00089         _cache[ KEY ].first = _coef[ LOCAL ].first * _coef[ KEY ].first;
00090         _cache[ KEY ].second =
00091           _coef[ LOCAL ].second * _coef[ KEY ].first + _coef[ KEY ].second;
00092     }
00093   };
00097   template<> class ClockMatrixCalc< TONE > {
00098     public:
00099       inline static void updateCache( TimeMatrix *_cache, TimeMatrix *_coef ) {
00100         _cache[ TONE ].first = _coef[ LOCAL ].first * _coef[ TONE ].first;
00101         _cache[ TONE ].second =
00102           _coef[ LOCAL ].second * _coef[ TONE ].first + _coef[ TONE ].second;
00103     }
00104   };
00105 
00109   class CurrentTime {
00110     public:
00111       enum {
00112         MATRIX_COUNT = 3
00113       };
00118       CurrentTime( Time _tick_length )
00119         : global_time( 0.0 ), tick_length( _tick_length ), pitch( 0.0f ) {
00120           int index;
00121           for( index = 0; index != MATRIX_COUNT; index++ ) {
00122             time_matrix[ index ].first = 1.0;
00123             time_matrix[ index ].second = 0.0;
00124           }
00125           ClockMatrixCalc< LOCAL >::updateCache( matrix_cache, time_matrix );
00126       }
00130       virtual ~CurrentTime() {}
00136       template< unsigned int _which >
00137           inline double getTime( unsigned int _offset ) const {
00138         double temp = global_time + tick_length * _offset;
00139         temp = temp * matrix_cache[ _which ].first + matrix_cache[ _which ].second;
00140         return temp;
00141       }
00145       inline void reset() {
00146         global_time = 0.0;
00147         int index;
00148         for( index = 0; index != MATRIX_COUNT; index++ ) {
00149           time_matrix[ index ].first = 1.0;
00150           time_matrix[ index ].second = 0.0;
00151         }
00152         ClockMatrixCalc< LOCAL >::updateCache( matrix_cache, time_matrix );
00153       }
00158       template< unsigned int _which >
00159         inline void swapMatrix( TimeMatrix &_matrix ) {
00160           std::swap( time_matrix[ _which ], _matrix );
00161           ClockMatrixCalc< _which >::updateCache( matrix_cache, time_matrix );
00162         }
00167       template< unsigned int _which >
00168         inline const TimeMatrix &getMatrix() const {
00169           return time_matrix[ _which ];
00170         }
00175       inline void noteOn( int _note ) {
00176         note = _note;
00177         freq = noteToFrequency( note + pitch );
00178         time_matrix[ TONE ].first = freq;
00179         time_matrix[ TONE ].second = 0.0f;
00180         time_matrix[ LOCAL ].first = 1.0f;
00181         time_matrix[ LOCAL ].second = -global_time;
00182         time_matrix[ KEY ].first = 1.0f;
00183         time_matrix[ KEY ].second = 0.0f;
00184         ClockMatrixCalc< LOCAL >::updateCache( matrix_cache, time_matrix );
00185       }
00190       inline void noteOff() {
00191         time_matrix[ KEY ].first = 1.0f;
00192         time_matrix[ KEY ].second = -getTime< LOCAL >( 0 );
00193         ClockMatrixCalc< KEY >::updateCache( matrix_cache, time_matrix );
00194       }
00199       inline void setPitchBend( float _pitch ) {
00200         pitch = _pitch;
00201         freq = noteToFrequency( note + pitch );
00202         float old_time = loop( getTime< TONE >( 0 ) );
00203         time_matrix[ TONE ].first = freq;
00204         ClockMatrixCalc< TONE >::updateCache( matrix_cache, time_matrix );
00205         float new_time = loop( getTime< TONE >( 0 ) );
00206         time_matrix[ TONE ].second -= new_time - old_time;
00207         ClockMatrixCalc< TONE >::updateCache( matrix_cache, time_matrix );
00208       }
00213       inline float getToneFrequency() const {
00214         return freq;
00215       }
00220       inline int getTone() const {
00221         return note;
00222       }
00227       inline float getPitchBend() const {
00228         return pitch;
00229       }
00234       inline void tick( unsigned int _sample_count ) {
00235         global_time += tick_length * _sample_count;
00236       }
00237     private:
00238       Time global_time;
00239       const Time tick_length;
00240       TimeMatrix time_matrix[ MATRIX_COUNT ];
00241       TimeMatrix matrix_cache[ MATRIX_COUNT ];
00242       Time clock_cache[ MATRIX_COUNT ];
00243       int note;
00244       float pitch;
00245       float freq;
00246   };
00247 
00251   template< unsigned int _sampling_rate, unsigned int _sample_count >
00252     class Clock : public CurrentTime {
00253       public:
00254         Clock() :
00255           CurrentTime( 1.0 / static_cast< double >( _sampling_rate ) ) {}
00256         virtual ~Clock() {}
00257         inline void tick() {
00258           CurrentTime::tick( _sample_count );
00259         }
00260       private:
00261     };
00262 }
00263 
00264 #endif
